data.description:
Set up your exhibition in the multi-user metaverse with Artshell on Meta Quest and Meta Quest Pro. Step out of the white cube, and finally get the immersive experience of showcasing your artworks in a new way using VR, by selecting, easily, from the archive of your Artshell account.
With the new Artshell Curator experience, you can design and share art like never before. Empower your visitors to move freely, alone or with others in multi-user mode, in a large visionary space, exploring entire floors in a borderless horizon. Artshell Curator features information on the display you have curated even with captions for individual works. Easily upload images from your Artshell account with the VR configurator to create and modify your display with Artshell Curator on Meta Quest.
With Artshell Curator artists and curators have a new tool to increase their visibility. Exhibition venues can reach a wider global audience and select the works they have always wanted to exhibit, without logistical limitations. 
Visitors can immerse themselves in this new art space from the comfort of home or anywhere else, without architectural barriers and reducing the environmental impact of their artistic passion. Artshell Curator is a project supported by the European Union - Next Generation EU.
